mapper.select: select o.oseq, o.pname, o.qnt, o.total, o.status, o.indate, d.startdate, d.enddate from orders o, product_detail d where o.pcode = d.pcode and id=#{id} and o.status = 1
select o.oseq, o.pname, o.qnt, o.total, o.status, o.indate, d.startdate, d.enddate from orders o, product_detail d where o.pcode = d.pcode and id=#{id} and not status = 1
select o.oseq, o.pname, o.qnt, o.total, o.status, o.indate, d.startdate, d.enddate from orders o, product_detail d where o.pcode = d.pcode and id=#{id} and o.status = 1 and d.enddate < sysdate
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET status = '2' WHERE oseq = #{oseq}
mapper.select: select l.id, l.pcode,d.name, d.startdate, d.price2 from likes l, product_detail d where l.id=#{id} and l.pcode = d.pcode
select name, mileage, mileage_used from member where id=#{id}
select q.qbno, q.writer, q.title, q.qcontent, q.regdate, q.viewcount, q.status, q.kind, q.oseq, a.qno, a.abno, a.acontent from qa q, answer a where qno(+)=qbno and writer=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from likes where id=#{id} and pcode = #{pcode}
mapper.select: select * from likes where id=#{id} and pcode = #{pcode}
select pw from member where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update member set phone = #{phone}, email=#{email} where id=#{id}
